secondary.description: Bone/Stone White - Warm background, avoids sterile clinical white

accent.description: Terracotta - Warmth for actions, alerts, and highlights

sidebar_strategy.problem: 25+ modules causing visual clutter and cognitive load.
sidebar_strategy.solution: Categorized Accordion Navigation with Search-First approach.

structure.search: Prominent 'Cmd+K' search bar at top of sidebar.

sidebar_strategy.visual_style: Ghost-style accordions. Active state uses a subtle left border strip (primary color) + light bg tint. Inactive items are muted.

buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-lg font-medium

cards.base: bg-white border border-border/60 shadow-sm rounded-2xl p-6 transition-all hover:shadow-md

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT SIDEBAR FIRST: Refactor the sidebar to use the 'Categorized Accordion' strategy defined above. Do not list 25 items flat.
2. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Organic & Earthy' color palette. Replace the default 'zinc/slate' grays with 'stone' (warm grays).
3. LAYOUT: Use a 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard. Mix 2x2 squares (stats) with 4x2 rectangles (charts).
4. TYPOGRAPHY: Ensure 'Manrope' is used for all headings. It gives a modern, friendly, yet technical feel.
5. INTERACTION: Add 'sonner' for toasts. Add 'framer-motion' for smooth sidebar expansion/collapse.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all sidebar items (e.g., 'nav-item-recruitment') and major buttons.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic blue gradients. Use solid, matte colors.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Don't cram content.
Motion: Sidebar transitions must be smooth (bezier curve).
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the 'Stone' background is sufficient (use dark charcoal, not light gray).
